variant.p: If an entity has received amounts that do not yet qualify for recognition as revenue in accordance with IFRS 15 (for example, the proceeds of a sale that does not qualify for revenue recognition), the entity recognises a liability in its opening IFRS statement of financial position and measures that liability at the amount received, adjusted (if appropriate) for a significant financing component in accordance with IFRS 15.
